caption.p: Disc diffusion and MIC plates of R. vulgaris extracts against S. mutans on Blood agar . a: 13:MeOH extracts, 14:MeOH:DCM extracts, 15:Aqueous extracts; +:positive control and -:negative control. b: 1:MeOH extracts at concentrations of 100 mg/ml, 2:50 mg/ml, 3:25 mg/ml, 4:12.5 mg/ml, 5:6.25 mg/ml and 6: 3.125 mg/ml
